author: Staff Reporter
text:
Masked men robbed a retired teacher and her daughter-in-law of gold jewellery, weighing 19 sovereigns,near Thuckalay on Wednesday night.

According to police, four masked men, who did not wear anything above waist, entered the house of the retired teacher, Mariya Anthony (75), in Adakachivilai in Mulaghumudu near Thuckalay, at midnight by breaking open the back door. They attacked Ms. Anthony and her daughter-in-law Chandra.

Then the robbers relieved the two of their jewellery and went away.

A similar robbery took place near Kaliyakavilai on Tuesday night. The police suspect that the same gang was involved in the two incidents.

The Thuckalay Assistant Superintendent of Police rushed to the spot and conducted an inquiry. Thuckalay police have registered a case.
title: Masked gang strikes at house of retired teacher
